title: Pain in the Brain - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/26/21
itunes:title: Pain in the Brain - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/26/21
description:
George Noory and Alan Gordon explore his cutting edge protocol for treating chronic pain, by examining how the brain perceives threats in the environment as physical ailments, and how to re-train the brain to eliminate the pain it feels.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
